TextView.android:text: 1 Want in Phrases In phrases, want is represented by the nt blend.
2 Ort The r is omitted in the sound ort.
3 R Omitted in ern, erm The r is omitted in the combinations tern, term, thern, therm, dern.
4 Md By rounding off the angle between m-d, we obtain the fluent md blend.
4 Md By rounding off the angle between m-d, we obtain the fluent md blend.
5 Mt The stroke that represents md also represents mt.
